meta.videoTitle: Goals Toolkit: How to Set & Achieve Your Goals

title_en: Tool 3: Define Verb Actions, Measurability & Specificity; Writing vs. Typing
title_zh: 工具3：明确定义动词行为、可测性和具体性；书写与打字

paragraphList.text_en: In order to achieve success in pursuing your goals, it is crucial to define the specific actions, measurability, and specificity of those actions. By focusing on a single priority goal and clearly delineating the verbs that will be involved in pursuing that goal, you set yourself up for a higher likelihood of success and sustained motivation throughout the process.
paragraphList.text_zh: 为了在追求目标过程中取得成功，定义具体的行动、可度量性和行动的具体性至关重要。通过专注于一个优先目标并明确划分与实现该目标有关的动作，您将提高成功的可能性，并在整个过程中保持动力。

paragraphList.text_en: When setting a goal, it is common for individuals to have a general idea in mind, such as wanting to be fit, proficient in a language, or wealthy. However, to truly maximize your chances of success, it is imperative to add a level of specificity to these goals. This means identifying the precise actions, or verbs, that will be instrumental in achieving the desired outcome. For instance, rather than stating a goal as "I want to be fit," it would be more effective to specify the actions involved, such as running a certain number of miles per week or attending the gym for a specific duration.
paragraphList.text_zh: 设定目标时，个人往往心中有一个大致的想法，比如想要保持健康、精通一门语言或是致富。然而，要真正最大化成功的机会，有必要为这些目标增加一定程度的具体性。这意味着要确定实现所期望结果的具体行动，或者说动词。例如，与其把一个目标表述为“我想要保持健康”，更有效的方式是具体说明所涉及的行动，比如每周跑固定的英里数或定期去健身房锻炼的时间。

paragraphList.text_en: The act of writing down your goal, along with the associated specific actions, plays a significant role in embedding that information into your subconscious. Studies have shown that physically writing out information on paper, as opposed to typing it on a digital device, engages neural circuitry in a unique way that enhances learning and retention. Therefore, it is recommended to take the time to write out your goals and action plans on paper to ensure a deeper connection to the information.
paragraphList.text_zh: 写下你的目标，以及相关的具体行动，这一行为在将这些信息内化到你的潜意识中起着重要作用。研究表明，将信息写在纸上，而不是在数字设备上输入，以独特方式参与神经回路，增强学习和记忆能力。因此，建议花时间在纸上写下你的目标和行动计划，以确保与信息建立更深的联系。

paragraphList.text_en: Furthermore, defining the measurability of your actions is crucial in monitoring progress and staying on track towards your goal. By specifying the amount of time or effort you will dedicate to each action on a weekly basis, you create tangible metrics to assess your progress and make any necessary adjustments along the way. This level of detail not only increases the probability of goal achievement but also fosters a sense of accountability and commitment to the process.
paragraphList.text_zh: 此外，在监控进展并朝着目标前进的过程中，界定您的行动可度量性至关重要。通过明确每项行动每周所需投入的时间或精力量，您可以创建明确的度量标准来评估进展，并在途中做出任何必要的调整。这种详细程度不仅提高了目标实现的可能性，还培养了对过程的责任感和承诺。

paragraphList.text_en: Research in goal setting and pursuit has consistently highlighted the significance of specificity and measurability in achieving success. Whether following the ABC method, the SMART method, or any other goal-setting framework, the emphasis on defining clear actions and measurable outcomes remains a core principle. Studies have shown that setting specific goals and outlining the associated actions can lead to a substantial increase in goal attainment rates across various domains.
paragraphList.text_zh: 目标制定和追求方面的研究一直强调了在取得成功过程中明确性和可测量性的重要性。无论是遵循ABC方法、SMART方法，还是任何其他目标设定框架，都强调在定义清晰行动和可衡量成果方面的核心原则。研究表明，设定具体目标并概述相关行动可以导致在各个领域的目标实现率大幅提高。

paragraphList.text_en: Ultimately, the process of defining verb actions, measurability, and specificity when setting goals is integral to achieving optimal results. By taking the time to clearly articulate your goals, identify the actions required, and establish measurable criteria for success, you position yourself for a more focused and effective pursuit of your aspirations. So, the next time you set a goal, remember the power of specificity and measurability in guiding your path towards success.
paragraphList.text_zh: 最终，在设定目标时，界定动词行为、可度量性和具体性的过程对于实现最佳结果至关重要。通过花时间清晰表达您的目标、确定所需的行动，并建立成功的可度量标准，您将使自己更具有针对性和有效性地追求愿望。因此，下次设定目标时，请记住具体性和可度量性在引导您走向成功道路中的力量。
